body:
Comment 1: 
It is possible that godoc could cut the http://golang.org off of doc URLs,
so that local instances and weekly. and tip. worked better.
This will fix itself when we push Go 1 to golang.org, so not a priority.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
